## ProductJsonLdProps.gtin14 property

The GTIN-14 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gtin14?: string | string[];
```

## Remarks

See [GS1 GTIN Summary](http://www.gs1.org/barcodes/technical/idkeys/gtin) for more details.
